title: TestDream.Dream1.Start
body:
I see you
I am Baal
You are a new channeler
the one who sees the crystals
You are like the rest
you take, my children fight you
you kill my children
and then you take
again and again
there will be no truce between us
you, like the rest, will fall
you are driven to take, and to fight
but you won't last forever
one day your masters will send enough of you to kill me
when they get greedy enough
until that time, however
we will be locked in conflict
<<returnToCampScene DialogAndPortraitContainer>>
